attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: close this site because it does not matter what the public of great britain (now to be called britain) want the politicians do not and will not listen hence the masive rises in fuel and all other commodities in this once GREAT nation - the politicians have destroyed it all

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
